purpose: Assist users in organizing and writing documents through a multi-agent approach.
principle: Leverages a multi-agent architecture to coordinate tasks related to document organization and writing.
reusability: Designed as a modular system that can be integrated into larger workflows, with potential API endpoints for extensibility.
limitations: Still in alpha stage, may have limited functionality and stability issues.
name: kiroku
description: Multi-agent that helps you organize and write documents.
highlight: Multi-agent system for organizing and writing documents efficiently.
